timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * Evaluates whether the record should be filtered out or not by executing the expression.
          
          
            
                 * Evaluates whether the record matches the predicate expression.
timeline.author: Naros
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -26,7 +26,7 @@
      * Evaluates whether the record should be filtered out or not by executing the expression.

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/debezium-core/src/main/java/io/debezium/transforms/filter/Engine.java b/debezium-core/src/main/java/io/debezium/transforms/filter/Engine.java
index e427250e7..0c6fada9e 100644
--- a/debezium-core/src/main/java/io/debezium/transforms/filter/Engine.java
+++ b/debezium-core/src/main/java/io/debezium/transforms/filter/Engine.java

@@ -23,10 +23,10 @@
     void configure(String language, String expression);
 
     /**
-     * Evaluates whether the record should be filtered out or not by executing the expression.
+     * Evaluates whether the record matches the predicate expression.
      *
      * @param record to be evaluated
-     * @return true to keep the record, false to remove it
+     * @return true if the input argument matches the predicate expression, otherwise false
      */
     boolean eval(ConnectRecord<?> record);
 }
